name: The Gun, The Guy, The Mission, and The Spy
name_original: The Gun, The Guy, The Mission, and The Spy
description:
The Gun, The Guy, The Mission, and the Spy is a narrative game similar to The Stanley Parable. This game was made for the Game Makers Toolkit Jam 2018 under the theme "A walking simulator without being boring." It is different than any other game I have ever made and was quite the challenge. Unfortunately I didn't get to tie off every narrative path with a nice little bow, but I believe I accomplished a lot more than I thought was possible. I plan to work on this game a bit more in the future to tie off those loose ends and practice my polishing ability.

I'd appreciate any and all feedback: gg@auburn.edu

My portfolio: ChristianGraham.org -- Always on the lookout for an internship in the games industry ;)
